languages.text: {n}Представители Экклезиархии теперь вынуждены передвигаться по ульям с многочисленной охраной, опасаясь нападений разъяренных схизматиков.{/n}
{n}The representatives of the Ecclesiarchy are now forced to move around the hives in the company of numerous guards, fearing attacks from the enraged schismatics.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Представители Экклезиархии теперь вынуждены передвигаться по ульям с многочисленной охраной, опасаясь нападений разъяренных схизматиков.{/n}

languages.text: {n}如今，每当国教代表在巢都周围活动时，都不得不在众多护卫的陪同之下前往目的地，生怕遭到愤怒的异教徒的攻击。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The representatives of the Ecclesiarchy are now forced to move around the hives in the company of numerous guards, fearing attacks from the enraged schismatics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}如今，每当国教代表在巢都周围活动时，都不得不在众多护卫的陪同之下前往目的地，生怕遭到愤怒的异教徒的攻击。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los representantes de la Eclesiarquía se ven ahora obligados a desplazarse por las colmenas en compañía de numerosos guardias, por temor a los ataques de los enfurecidos cismáticos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The representatives of the Ecclesiarchy are now forced to move around the hives in the company of numerous guards, fearing attacks from the enraged schismatics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los representantes de la Eclesiarquía se ven ahora obligados a desplazarse por las colmenas en compañía de numerosos guardias, por temor a los ataques de los enfurecidos cismáticos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帝国聖教会の代表者たちは、怒り狂った分派たちからの攻撃を恐れ、大勢の護衛兵を引き連れてハイヴの中を移動することを余儀なくされている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The representatives of the Ecclesiarchy are now forced to move around the hives in the company of numerous guards, fearing attacks from the enraged schismatics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帝国聖教会の代表者たちは、怒り狂った分派たちからの攻撃を恐れ、大勢の護衛兵を引き連れてハイヴの中を移動することを余儀なくされている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les représentants de l'Ecclésiarchie sont désormais contraints de se déplacer de ruche en ruche sous bonne garde, craignant les attaques des schismatiques fous de colère.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The representatives of the Ecclesiarchy are now forced to move around the hives in the company of numerous guards, fearing attacks from the enraged schismatics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les représentants de l'Ecclésiarchie sont désormais contraints de se déplacer de ruche en ruche sous bonne garde, craignant les attaques des schismatiques fous de colère.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Vertreter der Ekklesiarchie können sich nur noch in Begleitung unzähliger Wachen in den Makropolen bewegen, da sie Angriffe von erzürnten Abtrünnigen befürchten müssen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The representatives of the Ecclesiarchy are now forced to move around the hives in the company of numerous guards, fearing attacks from the enraged schismatics.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ekleşiarşi'nin öfkeden köpüren bölücülerin saldırılarından korkan temsilcileri, kovanların etrafında artık sayısız muhafız eşliğinde gezmek zorunda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The representatives of the Ecclesiarchy are now forced to move around the hives in the company of numerous guards, fearing attacks from the enraged schismatics.{/n}
